# actionSets

**Instance Property**

An array of the action sets in the home.

## Declaration

```swift
var actionSets: [HMActionSet] { get }
```

## Discussion

Action sets are instances of [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMActionSet].

## Creating action sets

- **addActionSet(withName:completionHandler:)**: Adds a new action set to the home.
- **removeActionSet(_:completionHandler:)**: Removes an action set from the home.
- **executeActionSet(_:completionHandler:)**: Executes all the actions in a specified action set.
- **builtinActionSet(ofType:)**: Retrieves the builtin action set for the specified type.
- **HMActionSet**: A collection of actions that you trigger as a group.
